document_data.name: Spinal Tap
document_data.mainbody: The '''Spinal Tap''' was a tavern located in the southern [[Ring Caverns (Oryndoll)|Ring Caverns]] that catered to [[mind flayer]]s.
document_data.Provender: The drinks of the tavern were made with cerebrospinal fluids flavored with various fungal additives and a little alcohol.
document_data.Entertainment: Typically, the tavern was supplied with entertainment by one or more thrivenists who played a unique [[illithid]] instrument called a [[bonethriven]].
